input_text:
Job Title: Inside Sales Representative - Software As Service (SAAS)

Location: Phoenix, AZ

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
A SOFTWARE AS A SERVICE (SAAS) COMPANY THAT SPECIALIZES WITHIN THE AUTOMOTIVE AND SERVICE SPACE IS LOOKING TO BRING ONE AN INSIDE SALES REP TO JOIN THEIR TEAM!

 Pay: $21-22/hr

 Schedule: Mon-Fri 8-5pm

 Start Date: ASAP

2-STEP INTERVIEW PROCESS

2 separate virtual interviews with different managers


 This office is located in Goodyear, AZ 

 Description 

We are looking for our next inside sales superstar! Whether you’re currently crushing sales or looking to start your career!

 What You’ll Do 

Inside sales has one goal – Top Line Revenue Growth. We’re focused on adding new accounts and driving revenue for the company. On the inside sales team, you’ll be following up on inbound leads and closing new business.

Work the phones and close sales, cold callingFollow up with inbound leadsOffer fantastic solutions that our prospects want, need, and actually use!Meet and exceed sales quotas


 Additional Skills & Qualifications 

What You Need:

A positive attitude and a desire to achieve resultsA desire to build a career in salesAbility to navigate search engines, CRM’s, and other basic computer functionsSales experience is preferred but we can teach you to sellThe ability to actively listen, seek information, ask questions, and solve problems


 Ideal Candidates 

Individuals who are trainable/moldable, want to grow with the organization and build a career there, ability to take instruction and also work independently to create their own solutions.Strong customer service (ie. worked in retail or customer facing jobs in the past)Self-starter, motivated and has initiativeMoney motivated, will start having the opportunity to earn commissions after 3 months


 Work Environment 

Brand new office, has a startup feel to it.

 About TEKsystems 

We're partners in transformation. We help clients activate ideas and solutions to take advantage of a new world of opportunity. We are a team of 80,000 strong, working with over 6,000 clients, including 80% of the Fortune 500, across North America, Europe and Asia. As an industry leader in Full-Stack Technology Services, Talent Services, and real-world application, we work with progressive leaders to drive change. That's the power of true partnership. TEKsystems is an Allegis Group company.

The company is an equal opportunity employer and will consider all applications without regards to race, sex, age, color, religion, national origin, veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, genetic information or any characteristic protected by law.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
